alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 11:27PM CDT until March 28 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Chambers County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Pasadena, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, Baytown, Deer Park, South Houston, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Beach City, Cloverleaf, Channelview, Highlands, Barrett, Greater Hobby Area, Morgan`s Point, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Harrisburg / Manchester, Park Place, Northshore, Houston Ship Channel, San Jacinto State Park and Clinton Park Tri-Community. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
